Name: heat distribution equipment production, hydronic radiant floor heating, 150m2 | heat distribution equipment, hydronic radiant floor heating, 150m2 | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/28:Manufacture of machinery and equipment n.e.c./281:Manufacture of general-purpose machinery/2815:Manufacture of ovens, furnaces and furnace burners
Description: A floor heating system with plastic tubing and aluminum heat conduction fins is chosen to ensure good thermal transfer. For cost reasons in most of the cases no buffer storage is installed. Due to this fact, it is very important to adjust the three cycles (heat use cycle, heat pump cycle, heat source cycle) in the best possible way to ensure optimal heat transfer at all times. ;References:;Persönliche Mitteilung Herr Keel, Zürcher Energieberatung, Zürich, August 1993.
